oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On quasi-classical limits of DQ-algebroids
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bressler, Paul
Gorokhovsky, Alexander
Nest, Ryszard
Tsygan, Boris

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We determine the additional structure which arises on the classical limit of a DQ-algebroid.
